item.title: My First attempt at setting up a blog...
item.description: First observations: Using the Hugo platform is not the easiest. It does require some technical knowledge but it’s obvious that the heavy lifting is done by Hugo itself. The Themes provided are also an interesting subject, since they come with some configuration options. I’m excited to explore this further and what cool things I can create using this framework.
